alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Laurens, east central Anderson, northeastern Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Abbeville, or near Honea Path, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Honea Path, Ware Shoals, Due West, Donalds, Cokesbury, Waterloo, Hodges, Shoals Junction and Lake Greenwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
